subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|せん}}
From {{der|ja|ltc|-|sort=せん}} {{ltc-l|箋}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{zh-l|箋|tr=jiān}}.

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The {{lang|ja|箋}} spelling for ''fuda'' is rare. The {{ja-l|札}} spelling is the most common.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
